title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 25
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 25
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Shoe Carnival (SCVL). Shoe Carnival Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest one-day gain since 2015 after its outlook was well received. The footwear retailer forecast fiscal-year sales will at least match the average analyst estimate in a Bloomberg survey and earnings will be in line with projections. First-quarter results were just below analysts' predictions.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
